Constructs a {{rlp|/|sentinel}}.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying sentinel with {{c|ranges::sentinel_t&lt;Base&gt;()}}.
@2@ Conversion from {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs the underlying sentinel {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} with {{c|std::move(other.end_)}}.
@3@ A private constructor which is used by {{lc|enumerate_view::end}}. Move constructs the {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} with {{c|std::move(end)}} This constructor is not accessible to users.
